name: Easy hentai puzzle
description:
Easy hentai puzzle is a puzzle game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture. In the pictures that need to be collected, shows beautiful girls. During the Assembly of the puzzle is a stopwatch, so the player can set his personal record. Every two levels there are more pieces to build the puzzle. The game is accompanied by a pleasant soundtrack.

Key game features:
- You can activate adult mode and collect the puzzle without censorship.
- The drawings of the girls were drawn specifically for this game!
- Unusual style of drawings.
- Achievements!
